reviewText: The video gives a frightening glimpse of the ugly underbelly of our American society. These people are clearly; humanities burden;  which only promises to expand via procreation in itself. There will come a time in our future, as a society, when incarceration must be the final solution to this culture of humans that threaten us all.  What happens when America fails? Do we let them all go free? Habitual offenders must be put down for the collective good of the prison system, and our safety.
